java/liquibase/ant/DatabaseRollbackTask.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00004 import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
00005 
00006 import java.io.Writer;
00007 import java.util.Date;
00008 
00012 public class DatabaseRollbackTask extends BaseLiquibaseTask {
00013 
00014     private Date rollbackDate;
00015     private String rollbackTag;
00016     private Integer rollbackCount;
00017 
00018     public Date getRollbackDate() {
00019         if (rollbackDate == null) {
00020             return null;
00021         }
00022         
00023         return (Date) rollbackDate.clone();
00024     }
00025 
00026     public void setRollbackDate(Date rollbackDate) {
00027         if (rollbackDate != null) {
00028             this.rollbackDate = new Date(rollbackDate.getTime());
00029         }
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getRollbackTag() {
00033         return rollbackTag;
00034     }
00035 
00036     public void setRollbackTag(String rollbackTag) {
00037         this.rollbackTag = rollbackTag;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public Integer getRollbackCount() {
00041         return rollbackCount;
00042     }
00043 
00044     public void setRollbackCount(Integer rollbackCount) {
00045         this.rollbackCount = rollbackCount;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void execute() throws BuildException {
00049         if (getRollbackDate() == null && getRollbackCount() == null && getRollbackTag() == null) {
00050             throw new BuildException("rollbackDatabase requires rollbackTag, rollbackDate, or rollbackCount to be set");
00051         }
00052         Liquibase liquibase = null;
00053         try {
00054             liquibase = createLiquibase();
00055             Writer writer = createOutputWriter();
00056             if (getRollbackCount() != null) {
00057                 if (writer == null) {
00058                     liquibase.rollback(getRollbackCount(), getContexts());
00059                 } else {
00060                     liquibase.rollback(getRollbackCount(), getContexts(), writer);
00061                 }
00062             } else if (getRollbackDate() != null) {
00063                 if (writer == null) {
00064                     liquibase.rollback(getRollbackDate(), getContexts());
00065                 } else {
00066                     liquibase.rollback(getRollbackDate(), getContexts(), writer);
00067                 }
00068             } else if (getRollbackTag() != null) {
00069                 if (writer == null) {
00070                     liquibase.rollback(getRollbackTag(), getContexts());
00071                 } else {
00072                     liquibase.rollback(getRollbackTag(), getContexts(), writer);
00073                 }
00074             } else {
00075                 throw new BuildException("Must specify rollbackCount, rollbackDate, or rollbackTag");
00076             }
00077             if (writer != null) {
00078                 writer.flush();
00079                 writer.close();
00080             }
00081         } catch (Exception e) {
00082             throw new BuildException(e);
00083         } finally {
00084             closeDatabase(liquibase);
00085         }
00086     }
00087 }
